vsim.simulator

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • vsim.simulator.Simulator

  • public final class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    The Simulator class contains useful methods to simulate and debug a RISC-V programs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void debug(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> files)
      This method takes an ArrayList of assembler filenames, then calls the assemble and link methods with this to generate a RISC-V linked program and finally calls debug(vsim.linker.LinkedProgram) to start debugging that linked program.
      static void debug(LinkedProgram program)
      This method creates a Debugger for a given linked program and starts a command line interface that a user can use to debug that linked program.
      static void simulate(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> files)
      This method takes an ArrayList of assembler filenames, then calls the assemble and link methods with this to generate a RISC-V linked program and finally simulates that generated linked program.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • simulate

        public static void simulate(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> files)
        This method takes an ArrayList of assembler filenames, then calls the assemble and link methods with this to generate a RISC-V linked program and finally simulates that generated linked program.
        Parameters:
        files - an array of assembler filenames
        See Also:
        Assembler.assemble(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>), Linker.link(java.util.ArrayList<vsim.assembler.Program>), LinkedProgram

      • debug

        public static void debug(LinkedProgram program)
        This method creates a Debugger for a given linked program and starts a command line interface that a user can use to debug that linked program.
        Parameters:
        program - the program to debug
        See Also:
        Debugger, LinkedProgram

      • debug

        public static void debug(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> files)
        This method takes an ArrayList of assembler filenames, then calls the assemble and link methods with this to generate a RISC-V linked program and finally calls debug(vsim.linker.LinkedProgram) to start debugging that linked program.
        Parameters:
        files - an array of assembler filenames
        See Also:
        debug(vsim.linker.LinkedProgram), Debugger, LinkedProgram
